ValidationRule.description: Block some percentage for some class.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($User.B2b_Bypass_Validation_Rules__c), NOT($Permission.Sales_Admin), OR( OR( B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 1, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 2, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 3, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 4, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 9, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 11, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 13, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 21, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 22, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 23, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 24, B2b_PercentageDiscountFirst__c = 25 ), OR( B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 1, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 2, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 3, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 9, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 11, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 13, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 21, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 22, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 23, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 24, B2b_PercentageDiscountComfort__c = 25 ), OR( B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 1, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 3, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 7, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 9, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 11, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 13, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 23, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 24, B2b_PercentageDiscountStandard__c = 25 ) ) )
